text: Panic in the Streets is a 1950 American crime thriller movie directed by Elia Kazan and stars Jack Palance, Richard Widmark, Paul Douglas, Barbara Bel Geddes, Zero Mostel, Tommy Rettig. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and won an Academy Award in 1950. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950 crime movies Category:1950s thriller movies Category:1950s crime thriller movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Elia Kazan Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Panic in the Streets (movie)
